resume_text:
NAME: Carol Davis
EMAIL: carol.davis@email.com
PHONE: (555) 456-7890

SUMMARY:
Senior DevOps Engineer with 10 years of experience in building and maintaining infrastructure for large-scale applications. Expertise in automation and cloud technologies.

SKILLS:
AWS, Azure, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Ansible, Git, Jenkins

EXPERIENCE:
Cloud Native Solutions - Principal DevOps Engineer (2020 - Present)
- Led the design and implementation of a cloud-native infrastructure on AWS.
- Automated deployment pipelines using Docker, Kubernetes, and Terraform.

DevOps Dynamics - Senior DevOps Engineer (2017 - 2020)
- Managed and maintained a large-scale infrastructure on Azure.
- Implemented monitoring and alerting systems using Prometheus.

EDUCATION:
Massachusetts Institute of Technology - Bachelor's in Electrical Engineering (2014)

CERTIFICATIONS:
AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Professional
Certified Kubernetes Administrator
